style.description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)调整代码格式，未有功能代码修改（例如：空白字符宽度、对齐、添加分隔符、注释）
style.title: Styles

refactor.description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature(重构代码，未涉及新功能或缺陷修复)
refactor.title: Code Refactoring

perf.description: A code change that improves performance(优化性能)
perf.title: Performance Improvements

test.description: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests(新增或修改测试代码)
test.title: Tests

build.description: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)修改构建系统或外部依赖(例如：gulp, broccoli, npm)
build.title: Builds

ci.description: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)修改自动化构建脚本 (例如: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)
ci.title: Continuous Integrations

chore.description: Other changes that don't modify src or test files(其它非代码或测试的变更)
chore.title: Chores

revert.description: Reverts a previous commit(恢复到上一次commit提交)
revert.title: Reverts
